remarks: The predicate "is a closed subspace" (of a pre-Hilbert space). (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cssval.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ocv ` W ) $.
cssval.c $e |- C = ( CSubSp ` W ) $.
iscss $p |- ( W e. X -> ( S e. C <-> S = ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` S ) ) ) ) $.
